dt: {bc}being in direct and {d_link|unequivocal|unequivocal} opposition {bc}directly opposite or opposed

dt.t: … some see the idea of a museum for rock & roll as {wi}antithetical{/wi} to the music's rebellious ethic …

pt: {sc}opposite{/sc} {sc}contradictory{/sc} {sc}contrary{/sc} {sc}antithetical{/sc} mean being so far apart as to be or seem irreconcilable. {sc}opposite{/sc} applies to things in sharp contrast or in conflict.
{sc}contradictory{/sc} applies to two things that completely negate each other so that if one is true or valid the other must be untrue or invalid.

pt.t: made {it}contradictory{/it} predictions about whether the market would rise or fall

pt: {sc}contrary{/sc} implies extreme divergence or diametrical opposition.
{sc}antithetical{/sc} stresses clear and unequivocal diametrical opposition.

pt.t: a law that is {it}antithetical{/it} to the very idea of democracy

shortdef: being in direct and unequivocal opposition : directly opposite or opposed
